addr: Stern School of Business - Room 2-60. 44 West 4th Street. New York, NY 10012
title: New York City - Create a World Changing Vision for Your Startup
desc:
New York University & Columbia Unversity Students and? Faculty: 
 Learn how to turn your idea into a world changing company from Silicon Valley leaders who have built billion dollar companies. ?If you have an innovation, are already working on a startup or just have a great idea, this free event is for you. You will learn how to position and articulate your idea for maximum impact. 
 FOUNDER.org is an investor in young innovators building world changing companies. FOUNDER.org provides an unrivaled experience through it?s 8D company building science, 12 month executive mentoring and early funding. 
 Hear from? Michael Baum, FOUNDER.org's CEO. He's an engineer, innovator and company builder, who has created six companies from scratch. Five of these were acquired by AT&T, Disney, IBM, Reuters and Yahoo! His most recent company, Splunk (SPLK), did its IPO in 2012. Michael has solved important problems, employed thousands of people and made shareholders a lot of money. He wants to help you do the same. 
 Learn more about FOUNDER.org at? http://www.founder.org 
 Hosted by the W. R. Berkley Innovation Lab? At? Kaufman Management Center,? NYU Stern School of Business,? Room 2-60
